description: Notification of the change in state of the connection to the BTS.

Summary.eval: ($v2==1) ? 'Gbis link status is up' : 'Gbis link status is down'

description: Unique BTS cell identity, 16 bits. GSM.03.03 4.3.1.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2BtsCellId

description: Current status of the Gbis link: LinkUp(True)/LinkDown(False).
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2NetworkStatusGbisLinkStatus

description: Notification of the change in state of the BSSGP connection to the SGSN.

event.Summary: Current state of BSSGP to SGSN connection is $v2

description: Unique BTS cell identity, 16 bits. GSM.03.03 4.3.1.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2BtsCellId

description: Current status of the BSSGP connection.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2NetworkStatusBssgpConnectionStatus

description: Notification of PCU startup.
Configured name of PCU.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2Name

description: Notification of changes in the status of GbQuat

Summary.eval: ($v2==1) ? 'Status of GbQuat link is up' : 'Status of GbQuat link is down'

description: Unique BTS cell identity, 16 bits. GSM.03.03 4.3.1.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2BtsCellId

description: Current status of the Gb-quat link: LinkUp(True)/LinkDown(False).
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2NetworkStatusGbquatLinkStatus

description: Notification of changes in the registration status of iPCU with
Gb-Nameserver over Gb-bis interface
Unique BTS cell identity, 16 bits. GSM.03.03 4.3.1.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2BtsCellId

description: Current iPCU registration status with Gb-Nameserver.
A registered state implies that iPCU has received its serving
Gb-Aggregator's address. An unregistered state implies that iPCU is in
the registration procedure with Gb-Nameserver to get the address of the
serving Gb-Aggregator.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2NetworkStatusGbbisRegistrationStatus

description: IP Address of the current serving Gb-Aggregator of the iPCU
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2GbAggregatorIpAddress

description: Gb-quat port of the current serving Gb-Aggregator of the iPCU
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2GbAggregatorPort

description: NSEI of the current serving Gb-Aggregator of the iPCU
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2GbAggregatorNsei

description: Notification of change in the overload status of iPCU in UL and/or DL
direction.

Summary.eval: ($v2 == 1 && $v3 == 1) ? 'iPCU overload status: both UL & DL overloaded' : (($v2 == 1) ? 'iPCU overload status: UL overloaded' : (($v3 == 1) ? 'iPCU overload status: DL overloaded' : 'iPCU overload status: not overloaded' ))

description: Unique BTS cell identity, 16 bits. GSM.03.03 4.3.1.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2BtsCellId

description: Current overload status of iPCU in UL direction.
iPCU is considered overloaded in UL, when it runs out of radio resources
in UL, and cannot assign new radio resources in UL. Overloaded(True).
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2NetworkStatusUlOverloadStatus

description: Current overload status of iPCU in DL direction.
iPCU is considered overloaded in DL, when it runs out of radio resources
in DL, and cannot assign new radio resources in DL. Overloaded(True).
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-PCU-V2-MIB::geranPcuV2NetworkStatusDlOverloadStatus
